reviews.title: Love Group Active
reviews.text: I have belonged to a gym for years that used the Mossa program then I moved away. So happy there’s an app I can still do my group active classes with Mossa. Thank you so much!

reviews.title: Good, needs a hamburger
reviews.text:
It would be helpful to have a hamburger menu to jump to workout sections.
Love MOSSA!

reviews.title: Best way to work out—so many options!
reviews.text: I did MOSSA workouts at my local YMCA for years prior to the pandemic. I was thrilled when they made the app available for anyone to sign up during COVID times. Now I can work out whenever I want to. there are so many different workouts to choose from. Even after years of using the app I am finally exploring all the options. My only beef with the app is that the user needs to be able to organize favorites in some usable way: type of workout, by time of work workout, etc. with my comments attached.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: Absolutely amazing library - I recommend to everyone!

reviews.title: Great workouts
reviews.text: These are the same classes I take at the gym.  The instructors are top notch.  I love the convenience of working out at home.

reviews.title: MOSSA ROCKS!
reviews.text: Group Power, Group Active, 3D-30, and really anything Mossa is fantastic.  Programming and music are second to none.  Mossa on Demand got me through the pandemic.  The workouts change your body and your mind!

reviews.title: Terrible App
reviews.text: Signed up for live previews of new releases. Couldn’t get on even though I refreshed everything. This happens all the time. I’m canceling for good this time

reviews.title: Greta value for a great workout
reviews.text: I used to be a regular at my gym that had MOSSA classes and then moved to a small town with the closest gym 30 minutes away. I am so happy to get the same experience at home and even workout with a trainer from my old gym (hi Mark!) The cost of the subscription (and equipment for Power) for the variety of regularly updated content is totally worth it.

reviews.title: Great at home workout!
reviews.text:
I’ve been a subscriber for at least 5 years and I still love this program!  There are so many options and there is something for everyone and all fitness levels.  I highly recommend this to anyone, especially if you’re looking for something that you can use any day of the week.  I’ve done the R30 (spin), Power, Core, Blast, and Centergy.  
The instructors are top notch and the workouts are very easy to follow.   5 stars from me!!

reviews.title: Love MOSSA!!!
reviews.text: MOSSA workouts are the best! The music is always great, and I love how the workout is choreographed to the beat. Makes the workout so much more enjoyable and effective. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.text: This app is reasonably priced and has a lot of variety with and without equipment.

reviews.title: Great Fitness Program
reviews.text: I have been using MOSSA On Demand for almost 3 years now and it is amazing. The workouts are varied and can be modified for any fitness level. They are constantly updating workouts and adding content. They also have segments that explain the reasons behind the different types of movements and programs. Technologically, there has been no issues. The videos play and the audio is excellent. I would highly recommend this program.

reviews.title: Nice but could use more variety
reviews.text: All workouts seem exactly the same

reviews.title: So flexible and full group classes when I want them!
reviews.text: I had joined MOSSA in April 2020 because I loved the classes at the gym I belonged to so thought I’d try out the app.  It was okay but there weren’t very many classes on the app at that time.  Fast forward to NOW and I’m absolutely amazed at all the class offerings and options (those combo classes - what?!?)!  I’m so excited to get back at it from home.  It still feels like I’m in a group class at the gym but I can do it on my schedule.  Thank you MOSSA!!

reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!!!
reviews.text: Fun and motivating workouts ‼️  Absolutely the best instructors ‼️  Thank you Mossa ‼️

reviews.title: So glad to have this on demand!
reviews.text:
As a former Mossa instructor, I was looking for a fitness option when I travel. So many of these programs do not require equipment OR I can use it at a gym using their equipment.
I also dusted off my equipment at home, from my instructor days, so I can do Group Active and Group Power at home, where there are no facilities within a reasonable distance that offer these amazing Mossa programs. I do however miss the community you get in the live group fitness setting.
Thank you Mossa!

reviews.title: Pretty fun!
reviews.text: A good way to get moving without it feeling like a chore. I do the group centergy and group fight

reviews.title: Great workouts, nice app
reviews.text:
This 70 year old guy loves the 60 min group power workout sessions. They are really good for me. I do one every four days on the same session for 6 times and then move the next one in the series. Finally up to #19.. It's amazing how they are all different but equally good. Kudos to the session leaders !!
Also - the workouts are best on a big screen (apple TV) but in a pinch the iPad screen will still get you going just fine...

reviews.title: Love the De-Desk Your Body Program
reviews.text: I’m not one of those fitness freaks. I love the ease of getting into this app and finding workouts that fit my pace. Great music too

reviews.title: Love my MOSSA home gym and app!
reviews.text: Used to drag myself to the gym for MOSSA, but with 3 kids and a full time job, it rarely fit my schedule. Now I wake up at 4:30 every morning and pick whatever MOSSA program I’m in the mood for! My favorites are Centergy, Power, Active, R30, and Fight (I’ll also Groove on occasion). So grateful to have this!

reviews.title: Best Workout App
reviews.text: This app has it all. So grateful for the variety and quality of these workouts. No getting bored or tired of seeing the same leader. No matter what your fitness goals are MOSSA has an answer for you.

reviews.title: Wicked Awesome Workout App
reviews.text:
I downloaded this app at the beginning of COVID because my Gym shut down and these were the workouts they used.  I bought the equipment, but they even have routines if you don’t.  Instructors and routines are all great, and they can be modified for any level.  What I like best is they have 10 minute, 30 minute and roughly 60 minute workouts, so they fit into what ever schedule you have.

Love this app!

reviews.title: Not happy with most recent version
reviews.text:
I am not sure what happened. Things got worse.
1. I can no longer control the class within the app using my wireless headphones. I used to be able to pause by touching my headphones.
2. The fast forward button during a class skips me to the next class I have downloaded.
3. I can’t find a way to skip ahead a few seconds or behind a few seconds without trying to manually move the timeline.

Perhaps this is something on my end, but it is corresponding to a new look in the app. It is much less user friendly.

reviews.title: Poor app management
reviews.text: This company’s apps / technology are very frustrating to use. I waste so much time having to figure out how to fix issues.

reviews.userName: Don't want to give a nickname
reviews.title: Upgrade made app worse
reviews.text: The upgrades have made the app worse than before. First, what took three clicks to get to a workout now takes six or more. They have added pictures that fill up the screen to make it pretty but took away ease of use.  Second, before the upgrade I could cast the video from my phone to a tv and see the video on both screens. This is very helpful so that my phone can be on the floor when I’m there for the workout. Now, the phone is blank. I contacted support and they said tough luck—it’s just the way the new app is designed. So, for a so-called upgraded app that now costs more per month you get less functionality. What a deal. Once the pandemic ends I look forward to canceling my subscription.

reviews.title: Best kickboxing/MMA available, bigtime!
reviews.text: I’ve been kickboxing and lifting weights at home for 20 years, and discovering MOSSA Fight on Xbox a few years ago truly brought me to a new level of badassery and fun. When Xbox got rid of it I was at a loss, so I got in touch with MOSSA and they released the workouts via DVD first, then streaming. These workouts use the BEST music you will find. The workouts truly use the music - for example, with a punch or kick you might hear breaking glass. Or during weight lifting, they will time each lift to the beat but the beat is varied, like: 1,2,3 (pause) 4! (Repeat). Believe me you will want to turn up the volume and the time will fly! After 20 years it was great to learn some new MMA moves too, several actually. I also enjoy their Centergy series, it’s a mash up of yoga and Pilates, great balance work too. There is something for everyone: dance, yoga, weights, step, bike, HIIT, etc. They have 10 minute workouts that you can combine to get a variety, or just do when short on time. Most workouts are 30 minutes so you could do two different ones. And recently they’ve added 60 minute workouts. I’ve been streaming this for a few years, since they started it and each year we got new additions. The app always works for me via my Apple TV without issues unlike my other fitness program. I’ve never left an app review before but I figured it’s time for me to show my appreciation to MOSSA and try to spread the word. Amazing music, trainers and workouts.

reviews.title: Blast!
reviews.text: Best at home cardio burner! Tones your legs!

reviews.title: Paid and can’t use the app
reviews.text:
I have been paying for several
Months and every time I try to click on class it ask to subscribe but I’m already a paying customer... my acct renews on 14 th every month and I have not be able to access one class for months!!! I have tried emailing and haven’t gotten any support! VERY FRUSTRATING

reviews.title: Still moving!
reviews.text: Will update to 5 stars... Looking forward to the new material and the 60 minute workouts! Love the multi directional movements and balanced exercise routines.

reviews.title: Doesn’t let me log in
reviews.text: So I had this app for a few months and it was great. Loved the work outs and even bought all the equipment. Well, I resubscribed and all the app does is crap. Tried my fire stick, iPad, and iPhone. Just keeps telling me to activate my already activated subscription. After 2days of the same thing over and over, I cancelled. Not worth my time or stress to try to log in.

reviews.title: Excellent workouts.
reviews.text: I enjoy the mossa series workouts. My only complaint is that new workouts should be added more frequently. Ie. core

reviews.title: MOSSA Move
reviews.text: Love MOSSA MOVE classes on their app!  They have a variety of different classes that keep you motivated.   Some of my favorites are fight, blast, core, and power! The best part is that you can go at your own level giving you instructors on the platform showing you what to do!  MOSSA has helped me stay in shape during this pandemic!

reviews.title: Auto subscription not working
reviews.text: I signed up for an Auto subscription for MOSSA Move, it has been processing the past few months. It did not auto renew in August. When I try to manually renew, it just says pending, and now I can’t access the app! What do I do? I tried to report a problem to Apple, but they don’t address these issues - is it a problem with this app? Please help!

reviews.title: Great workouts
reviews.text: Workouts are great even without equipment. Almost like being back at the gym!

reviews.title: MOSSA MOVE ROCKS!
reviews.text:
Who says you need 60 minutes or more per workout session to improve your health and fitness???? These 30-minute, cutting edge programs are packed with energy, awesome soundtracks and the world’s BEST instructors! 

The 30-minute formats are a great compliment to the 60-minute MOSSA programs offered in elite clubs world-wide. It is nice that they are not simply a ‘club class’ watered down to a half hour. They have different moves and a totally different training effect.

Thank you MOSSA for your continued push to make exercise more innovative, fun and accessible to all.

PS: for those who haven’t tried a ‘live’ class at a club, find a gym in your area that offers these amazing, results-driven programs!

~Peggy Gregor

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.text: Great exercise and fitness levels options!! Just need more groove classes!

reviews.title: Great Routines—Still Slow on Adding Content
reviews.text: It’s still disappointing to me that they rarely add new content. And now a video that has been there for more than a year is labeled as new which is a little confusing. But what is there is great quality and makes me eager for more!

reviews.title: Slowwwww
reviews.text: The app, nor the website, are able to handle the number of people that are signing up right now. It’s terrible. Please update to handle the capacity.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text:
Update: will not work with Vizio smart cast. Unfortunately for me that’s big tv in the room with the most space. 
Works well with chrome cast. 

Mossa workouts have helped me lose weight. Programs are fun, and never get dull. Many great programs to try. 

I used the app on the Xbox when it came out, and I’m glad they have made an app now!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.text: Love how simple it is to navigate the app. I mostly login on my laptop to do the workouts. The 30 minute format is the right amount of time for each workout and if I’m feeling good I’ll do. Second. I would love to see Centergy added to the list of workouts.

reviews.title: Awesome workouts! App Functions need improvement.
reviews.text: I love doing the Fight and Core workouts on this app. Great music, energetic trainers, a lot of work and a lot of fun. There are some functions that need improvements, however. If I need to pause the workout to refill my water or catch my breath, the entire workout starts over and there is no option to fast forward or backward to find where I left off. Is there a fix to this yet?

reviews.title: About time
reviews.text: I have been waiting for this app since Xbox got rid of Xbox fitness. I’m super excited to get back to my workout routine.
